products.title: Beaded Lace Black
products.short_description: Elegant black beaded lace with intricate details
products.full_story: This luxurious black beaded lace features exquisite craftsmanship, perfect for evening wear and special occasions. The delicate beads catch the light beautifully, adding a touch of glamour to any outfit.
products.care_instructions: Dry clean only. Handle with care.

products.title: Classic Blue & White Kente
products.short_description: Elegant blue and white traditional pattern
products.full_story: A timeless classic featuring the serene combination of blue and white. This pattern represents peace, harmony, and purity in Ghanaian culture.
products.care_instructions: Hand wash cold. Line dry in shade.

products.title: Traditional Wedding Kente
products.short_description: Ceremonial Kente perfect for weddings and celebrations
products.full_story: This ceremonial Kente is specially woven for weddings and important celebrations. Its intricate patterns symbolize love, unity, and prosperity.
products.care_instructions: Professional dry cleaning only. Store in breathable fabric bag.

products.title: Contemporary Gold Kente
products.short_description: Modern interpretation of classic Kente with gold accents
products.full_story: A contemporary take on traditional Kente, blending modern aesthetics with time-honored weaving techniques. Perfect for special occasions.
products.care_instructions: Dry clean recommended. Keep away from moisture.

products.title: Ewe Kente Masterpiece
products.short_description: Intricate Ewe design with vibrant multicolor patterns
products.full_story: Crafted by skilled Ewe weavers from the Volta Region, this Kente showcases the distinctive geometric patterns and vibrant colors that characterize Ewe textiles.
products.care_instructions: Hand wash with cold water. Air dry flat.

products.title: Royal Asante Kente
products.short_description: Traditional Asante pattern with gold and black weave
products.full_story: This exquisite Kente cloth represents the rich heritage of the Asante people. Handwoven by master craftsmen in Bonwire, Ghana, each thread tells a story of royalty and tradition.
products.care_instructions: Dry clean only. Store in a cool, dry place away from direct sunlight.
